example[0]: Police described it as a sickening racial attack.
example[2]: It is sickening that human beings have done this to two innocent young women.
definition[1]: very unpleasant and making you feel as if you want to vomit
example[3]: The sickening stench of rotting rubbish rose into the air.
example[4]: ‘Helen’s just bought herself a huge house in the South of France.’ ‘God, how sickening!’
